function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_DZFKHFLCB') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

step.name: 投资银行总部职能经理审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

dynOwner.describe: 新三板_质控二部审核专员
新三板_质控二部总经理
新三板_公文流转文管员

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatWorkFlow("lcIB_DZFKHFLCB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'110000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_DZFKHFLCB",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}
